TopicTitle: Problems with exporting part on Unity 5

Articles.Content: Hi all, i am trying to export part, i have partstool and all set up, but cant find how to export to .mu file. Please help ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

First I don't think KSP is using Unity 5.

As far as exporting goes - first click on the top game object in the Hierarchy on the left 

then the inspector should have a "write" button under "Part Tools (Script)"

Sorry - was trying to imbed a picture but it's not working.
There is no on unity 5 "Part Tools (Script)", probably as you say ksp dont support it, will download older version.
I think the last version of Part Tools is 0.23 - still works with KSP version of Unity
